resources.string: %1$s has trouble starting the hotspot when a VPN is connected.
Please disconnect from your VPN, and then attempt to launch the Hotspot again. Alternatively, you can enable the \"%1$s\" tweak to test if your VPN works with %2$s
%1$s has trouble starting the hotspot when a Location services are off. Even if you grant Location permission, you must still have the service turned on for things to work.

Please enable Location on your device, and then attempt to launch the Hotspot again. Alternatively, you can enable the \"%1$s\" tweak to test if %2$s works on your device without requiring Location to be on.
